title: Citizen Science Competency Enhancement Program for Organizational Learning Culture and Group Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course focused on fostering organizational learning culture and group collaborative learning competencies for general citizens, offering flexible learning experiences via mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core elements of an organizational learning culture (openness, trust, knowledge sharing).
Learners can analyze peer feedback using survey tools that measure group learning effectiveness.
Learners can practice facilitating as a learning facilitator using digital platforms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
